data.name: Jumps Demo
data.detailed_description: Jumps is a fast paced first person platformer, the aim of the game is to finish each world in under a certain amount of time, you have a limited amount of times you can jump for each level too. Jumps has 6 unique worlds to jump through, 10 levels in each. Each world introduces exciting new game mechanics to figure out and master, including trampolines, cannons, rocket jumping and more!
data.about_the_game: Jumps is a fast paced first person platformer, the aim of the game is to finish each world in under a certain amount of time, you have a limited amount of times you can jump for each level too. Jumps has 6 unique worlds to jump through, 10 levels in each. Each world introduces exciting new game mechanics to figure out and master, including trampolines, cannons, rocket jumping and more!
data.short_description: Enter a world of sky islands and jump your way to the finish, you must complete each level with a certain amount of jumps! and HURRY, you must complete each world in under a certain amount of time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1gb VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Unless your computer is a potato, you'll be able to run this game.

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1gb VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Unless your computer is a potato, you'll be able to run this game.
